tool_description: An API to convert between, extract and parse numerous common generic and bank specific financial message formats.
name: Bank Converter
title: Bank Converter

api_list.name: ExtractMessageV1
api_list.description: Extract (parse) statement messages in BAI or MT94X into to csv or json format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bankconverter.p.rapidapi.com/V1/ExtractMessage"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bankconverter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
